title: Little Mix confirm new talent show The Search and you apply right now
text:
Little Mix are on the look out for the next big thing (Picture: BBC)

Little Mix have confirmed that they’ve united with the BBC to find the next big pop group in TV series, Little Mix: The Search.

Jade Thirlwall, Jesy Nelson, Leigh-Ann Pinnock and Perrie Edwards will be creating bands (all-female, all-male and mixed) from their hopefuls who think they have what it takes to follow in their footsteps.

The seven-part series will see the group mentor the young stars as they all live together, giving them access to their top-tier background team including vocal coaches, song writers and stylists.

Whoever wins will go on tour with the band as their warm-up act next year.

Basically, say goodbye to heading out on Saturday nights, Mixers – they’ve got you sorted.

The group confirmed the plans on Nick Grimshaw’s Drivetime show on BBC Radio 1 tonight.

The winners will be joining Little Mix on tour (Picture: Joseph Okpako/WireImage)

In a statement about the show, the Bounce Back hitmakers said: ‘We want to create lots of incredible groups who really gel.

‘As we have been there and done it ourselves, we know what it takes to make a group successful, and will be there to mentor them every step of the way.

‘We want solo artists to audition as well as groups and every type of genre is welcome too.’

If you think you have what it takes, you can head to bbc.co.uk/littlemixthesearch for more details and to submit an application.

More: Little Mix Little Mix 'to launch own talent show to rival Simon Cowell's X Factor' Jesy Nelson's boyfriend Chris Hughes replaces Jade Thirlwall during Little Mix rehearsal Britain's Got Talent's Twist And Pulse call on Little Mix for epic collaboration

‘It’s a real privilege to be building a new show around such a successful and loved British band,’ Andrea Hamilton, Executive Producer of ModestTV said.

‘Creating bands means relationships matter and there’s no one better to share that experience than Little Mix, who are living it right now.’

Little Mix: The Search is coming to BBC One in 2020.
